snippet.title: Dread Templar  - Game Announcement Trailer [Retro FPS]
snippet.description:
Dread Templar is a fast-paced retro FPS coming in Steam Early Access this Fall!

Wishlist the game now Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1334730/Dread_Templar/

Dread Templar is a fast-paced retro FPS that combines 90s classic shooter elements with modern skill-based FPS controls. You are a Dread Templar who entered Hell seeking revenge. But in order to get it, you have to fight your way through the dark realm!

Follow us:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/1CEntertainment
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/1c-entertainment
Website: http://www.1cpublishing.eu/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/1CCompany/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/1C_Company
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/1c_entertainment/

#Retro #FPS
